item.title: Cheap 15$ Air quality monitor: ESP32, Bluetooth & Home assistant
item.description: If you are a DIY lover, the first sensors you look at are : temperature sensor and airquality sensor. #Metoo. I have started with the temperature sensor in this article and found that amazing. I decided to go try the airquality monitoring. I wanted something cheap, and ideally with bluetooth to connect it easily to my ESP32 and Home assistant, I found that Airbox WP6003 can do the job. Requirements: Aliexpress:
